item.name: sticky state
item.autogen:
__KeyToKey__
KeyCode::SPACE, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R | ModifierFlag::EXTRA1,
KeyCode::KEY_0, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::SPACE,

item.name: Uber Key Mappings
item.appendix: Must unmap all Mac OS X level F-key shortcuts (none are useful)
